help: Hi there, I'm your super fantastic menu bot! Let me explain my commands!
menu:
/menu: followed by the menu that you want to insert in the format of 
MENU TITLE
FIRST
plate
...
plate

SECOND
plate
...
plate

CONTOUR
plate
...
palte

SWEET
sweet
..
sweet

DRINK
drink
...
drink

 It is important to respect the upper case keywords. You don't have to put all of them, but they must be written in the same way.
